original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 20:21:15' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-13 01:26:16' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.Score<=19 AND p.CommentCount<=13 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-07 12:06:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.BountyAmount<=50 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-21 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-14 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views>=0 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-19 21:33:14' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 20:21:15' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-13 01:26:16'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) >= -1 AND CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) <= 19 AND posts.CommentCount <= 13
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views >= 0 AND users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-19 21:33:14'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2 AND postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-07 12:06:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2E6.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E6E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E6E4.PostId=E3.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount <= 50 AND (CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-21 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-14 00:00:00')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E4E3E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E6E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E6E4E3.UserId=E5.UserId)
